languages.text: For each common debuff and trauma stack on target deals an additional +1 base damage.

traits.locale_text: For each common debuff and trauma stack on target deals an additional +1 base damage.

languages.text: This weapon deals an additional +1 base damage for each common {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effect{/g} and each {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g} on the target.
languages.original_text: Это оружие наносит +1 базовый урон дополнительно за каждый общий {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}негативный эффект{/g} и каждую {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травму{/g} на цели.

traits.locale_text: This weapon deals an additional +1 base damage for each common negative effect and each trauma on the target.

languages.text: Bu silah, hedefin üzerindeki her yaygın {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etki{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travma{/g} için +1 ilave taban hasar verir.

languages.text: Esta arma inflige un +1 adicional de daño básico por cada {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efecto negativo{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g} que tenga el objetivo.

traits.locale_text: Esta arma inflige un +1 adicional de daño básico por cada efecto negativo y aflicción que tenga el objetivo.

languages.text: 这把武器进行攻击时，目标每有一项常规{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}，这把武器的基础伤害就提高1点。

languages.text: Cette arme inflige +1 point de dégâts de base par {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effet négatif{/g} commun et par {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g} sur la cible.

languages.text: この武器は、ターゲットの共通の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}ネガティブ効果{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}につき追加の+1ダメージを与える。

languages.text: Diese Waffe verursacht zusätzlich +1 Bass für jeden gewöhnlichen {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negativen Effekt{/g} und jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g}, mit dem das Ziel belegt ist.
